name: get-oligo-annealing-protocol
title: Oligo Annealing Protocol
description: Get standard protocol for annealing complementary oligonucleotides
content:
Overview

This application provides a detailed, step-by-step protocol for annealing complementary oligonucleotides without phosphorylation.

Protocol Includes

  • Reaction mixture preparation
  • Thermocycler program settings
  • Dilution instructions
  • Storage recommendations

Output

Returns a JSON file with complete protocol including steps, components, and notes.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/get_oligo_annealing_protocol.py -o "${outputDir}"

spec.name: outputDir
spec.label: Output Directory
spec.description: Select or create a stash folder where protocol will be saved
